title: Rate of Motion Profile (RMP)
description: This function block generates a ramp signal based on the input parameters, adjusting the ramp according to the current time and direction. It calculates the steps to be applied to the ramp value based on enabling signals, direction changes, and elapsed time. This helps in controlling a process or actuator that requires smooth ramping behavior.
name: _RMP_W

input.name: DIR
input.description: Indicates the direction of the ramp. True for one direction and false for the opposite.

input.name: E
input.description: Enable signal for the ramp calculation. Default value is TRUE.

input.name: TR
input.description: Time interval used for calculating the ramp step.

output.name: RMP
output.description: The calculated ramp value constrained between 0 and 65535.
